mapper.select: select p.p_name, p.p_lowercost, p.p_uppercost, p.p_startdate, p.e_pr_num, p.e_num from project p, p_job p2, job j, f_job fj, freelancer fr where p.e_pr_num = p2.e_pr_num and p2.job_id = j.job_id and j.job_id = fj.job_id and fj.f_num = fr.f_num and fj.job_id = p2.job_id and fr.f_num = #{f_num}
